title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Numerical simplification is not required for the second point. The second point may be earned with use of a tangent line equation that has the correct slope and a maximum of one computational error.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes both of the criteria below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
To be eligible for any points, the Taylor polynomial must be about x=3. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG4bGaeyypa0JaaG4mai aac6caaaa@36A6@

The first and second points may be earned without algebraic or numerical simplification. A maximum of 1 point out of the first 2 points may be earned if all terms are correct AND the response includes extra terms and/or the use of +⋯. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcqWIVlctcaGGUa aaaa@36B6@

Numerical simplification is not required for the third point. However, use of the equals sign rather than approximately equals does not earn the point (e.g., f ( 2.5 )=13.5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGMbGaaGjcVpaabmaaba GaaGOmaiaac6cacaaI1aaacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaeyypa0JaaGymaiaa iodacaGGUaGaaGynaaaa@3D55@ )

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
